summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 FORD FOCUS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE STOPPED AT A TRAFFIC LIGHT, THE VEHICLE STALLED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE INSTRUMENT CLUSTER DISPLAYED A TRANSMISSION FAULT CODE. THE CONTACT WAS ABLE TO RESTART THE VEHICLE AFTER APPROXIMATELY FIFTEEN MINUTES. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FAILURE WAS INTERMITTENT. NEITHER THE DEALER NOR THE MANUFACTURER WERE CONTACTED OR NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 65,200.
